embeddedItem.name: Wrathful Gauntlets
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases ATK of all allies by 5% with an extra <nobr>170</nobr> to ATK for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
This pair of gauntlets are driven by pure flame of anger.
Pure flame would also work.

"Scott Business Alliance, made for the champions!"

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

155889.name: Phlogiston
155889.lore:
Particles that form the flame.
Genius Society #2 Harald Punch proved its existence, but #3 Nyul Iman disproved it.
#7 Bohdan overthrew Iman's conclusion and proved it again before getting killed by #4 Polka Kakamond days after announcing Phlogiston's existence.

"Does it exist or not? We're not interested, frankly speaking."
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Flamespawns or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

440513.name: Mechanical Parts
440513.lore:
Essential components of all machines with strange shapes and specific functions.
Without them, nothing can be made.

"With the same parts, Screwllum can make entire planets and create cyborgs. But you can only make me a watch that runs seven seconds late every day."
"Seven seconds is good enough! Just a hair later than the clocks they use in observatories."
comeFrom: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

473891.name: Recipe: Wrathful Gauntlets
473891.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
